contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox scientist |name = Ilkka Tuomi |image = |image_size = |caption = |birth_date = {{birth-date|26 September 1958}} |birth_place = |residence = [[Finland]] |citizenship = |nationality = Finnish |fields = |workplaces = |alma_mater = |doctoral_advisor = |academic_advisors = |doctoral_students = |notable_students = |known_for = |author_abbrev_bot = |author_abbrev_zoo = |influences = |influenced = |awards = |signature = <!--(filename only)--> |footnotes = }} '''Ilkka Tuomi''' (born 26 September 1958), a native of [[Finland]], is noted for writings on the subject of the [[Internet]]. ==Works== Ilkka Tuomi has written books, including ''Networks of Innovation|Networks of Innovation: Change and Meaning in the Age of the Internet''<ref>{{cite book | last = Tuomi | first = Ilkka | authorlink = Ilkka Tuomi | year = 2002 | title = Networks of Innovation | url = http://www.oup.com/uk/catalogue/?ci=9780199256983 | publisher = Oxford University Press | isbn = 978-0-19-925698-3 }}</ref> which develops theory of [[open innovation]] based on analysis of Internet-related innovations and [[open source]], and ''Corporate Knowledge: Theory and Practice of Intelligent Organizations'',<ref>{{cite book | last = Tuomi | first = Ilkka | authorlink = Ilkka Tuomi | year = 1999 | title = Corporate Knowledge: Theory and Practice of Intelligent Organizations | url = http://www.meaningprocessing.com/personalPages/tuomi/articles/CorpKstart.html | publisher = Metaxis | isbn = 951-98280-0-1 }}</ref> which develops theory of [[knowledge management]]. Tuomi has written several articles in ''[[First Monday (journal)|First Monday]]'', an important [[peer review]]ed journal on the [[Internet]]. The most famous of Tuomi's articles is probably ''The Lives and Death of Moore's Law '', in which Tuomi states that [[Moore's Law|Moore's law]] is an expression of [[technological determinism]], used sloppily, and to a large extent not properly founded in [[empiricism|empirical]] studies. This article has an associated response from Ray Kurzweil at: [http://www.kurzweilai.net/exponential-growth-an-illusion-response-to-ilkka-tuomi Exponential Growth:-An Illusion (Response to Ilkka Tuomi)] ==Career== Ilkka Tuomi was a staff member of the [[Institute for Prospective Technological Studies]]. He has also been Principal Scientist at the Nokia Research Center. He is Chief Scientist at [http://www.meaningprocessing.com/ Oy Meaning Processing Ltd.], an independent research institute located in [[Finland]]. ==References== '''Ilkka Tuomi''' key papers at First Monday: * Ilkka Tuomi, [http://firstmonday.org/htbin/cgiwrap/bin/ojs/index.php/fm/article/view/1000/921 The Lives and Death of Moore's Law], ''[[First Monday (journal)|First Monday]]'', volume 7, number 11 (November 2002) * Ilkka Tuomi, [http://firstmonday.org/htbin/cgiwrap/bin/ojs/index.php/fm/article/view/824/733 Internet, Innovation, and Open Source: Actors in the Network], ''[[First Monday (journal)|First Monday]]'', volume 6, number 1 (January 2001) * Ilkka Tuomi, [http://firstmonday.org/htbin/cgiwrap/bin/ojs/index.php/fm/article/view/1151/1071 Evolution of the Linux Credits File: Methodological Challenges and Reference Data for Open Source Research], ''[[First Monday (journal)|First Monday]]'', volume 9, number 6 (June 2004) * Ilkka Tuomi, [http://firstmonday.org/htbin/cgiwrap/bin/ojs/index.php/fm/article/view/1159/1079 Economic Productivity in the Knowledge Society: A Critical Review of Productivity Theory and the Impacts of ICT], ''[[First Monday (journal)|First Monday]]'', volume 9, number 7 (July 2004) ==Notes== <references/> ==External links== *[http://www.meaningprocessing.com/personalPages/tuomi/moreinfo.html Further information about Ilkka Tuomi] From the website of Oy Meaning Processing Ltd. {{Authority control|VIAF=43658088}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Tuomi, Ilkka | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Finnish computer scientist | DATE OF BIRTH = 26 September 1958 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tuomi, Ilkka}} [[Category:1958 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Finnish people]] [[Category:Finnish computer scientists]] {{compu-scientist-stub}} {{Finland-writer-stub}}
